ygData.subject: Call for help! Spoiler and Spoiler Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok. I am compiling the information for the Lambent Armor Quest (that we know of as of now). I have found the location and levels for most of the mobs. I will
ygData.messageBody:
Ok. I am compiling the information for the Lambent Armor Quest (that we know of as of now).

I have found the location and levels for most of the mobs. I will paste what I have below. If any of
my information is wrong then please let me know either through personal email or the list. Also any
help in filling in the blanks would be appreciated as well.

Thanks
Ranian Aeleroth

SPOILER INFORMATION
***
***
***
***
***
***
***
***

******************************************************************************************
Spoiler info:
1. Lambent Gauntlets
Shin Gauntlets from a Froglok Shin Knight (Lower Guk; 35)
Black Silk Gloves from a Deathly Usher (Castle Mistmoore. ; Level 30'ish)
Lambent Star Ruby

2. Lambent Greaves
Icy Greaves from an Elite Goblin Guard (Permafrost; Level 25; Room is tough)
Shin Greaves from a Shin Ghoul Knight (Lower Guk; Level ?)
Lambent Fire Opal

3. Lambent Boots
Firewalker Boots from a Solusek Mage (Solusek A, level 25'ish)
Middle portion of the Rune of the One Eye from Froon (West Karana; Level 30)
Lambent Sapphire

4. Lambent Helm
Opoline Helm from a Deepwater Goblin (Dagnor's Cauldron?; Level 30'ish)
Mudwater Rune from a Lizard Fanatic (Cazic Thule; Level 30)
Lambent Star Ruby.

5. Lambent Breastplate
Basalt Carapace from a Basalt Gargoyle (Lower Guk; level ?)
Gypsy Lute from ? (Castle Mistmoore; Level ?)
Lambent Ruby

6. Lambent Vambraces
Fiery Vambraces from a Solusek Champion (Solusek ; Level 25-30)
The top portion of the Rune of the One Eye from Choon (West Karana; Level 30)
Lambent Sapphire

7. Lambent Bracers
Dark Boned Bracelet from a Greater Dark Boned Skeleton (?; Level ?)
Griffenne Charm from a Griffenne (Karana's; Level 25-30)
Lambent Fire Opal
